      • newGameComplete

        public java.lang.String newGameComplete(int problemID,
                                        java.lang.String name1,
                                        int type1,
                                        int depth1,
                                        java.lang.String name2,
                                        int type2,
                                        int depth2)
        Creates a new match with all the information
        Parameters:
        problemID - identifies the problem on the DB
        name1 - name of the white player
        type1 - 0 if human, 1 if machine1, 2 if machine2
        depth1 - depth of the algorithm if type1 > 0
        name2 - name of the black player
        type2 - 0 if human, 1 if machine1, 2 if machine2
        depth2 - depth of the algorithm if type2 > 0
        Returns:
        the FEN of the problem

        public boolean isInCheck(java.lang.String color)
        Checks if the player's king is in danger
        Parameters:

                         java.lang.String difficulty)

        Returns:
